text: John Leslie "Wes" Montgomery (March 6, 1923 â€“ June 15, 1968) was an American jazz guitarist. He was of the most important guitarists of the 20th century. Montgomery died of a heart attack on June 15, 1968, while at home in Indianapolis. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:1968 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American jazz musicians Category:American guitarists Category:Musicians from Indianapolis
title: Wes Montgomery
